1513090.name: Blimps
1513090.description:
Blimps is an open-world survival RPG.

"Soar Above the Rest: Experience a Throwback Adventure RPG Like Never Before!"

In Blimps, embark on a thrilling single-player journey, or team up for a memorable local couch co-op experience.​ Step into the captain's chair of an electric airship cargo delivery empire, armed with an arsenal of water, fire, and ice cannons and a trusty pair of hangar robots ready to assist you. Can you learn to survive in this world of Blimps only to escape it?

"An RPG as Pure as the Clouds: No Ads, Microtransactions, Just Pure Magic!"

With determination and skill, you could be the one to soar above the rest and escape the enchanting world of Blimps! Navigate the skies to deliver vital cargo, or take a bold risk by looting from rival Blimps—if you dare!

"Old-School Fun Meets High-Flying Adventure – Grab the Controls and Soar!"

This airship sandbox game invites you to dive into a dynamic playground where you can collect treasures, compete in thrilling challenges, educate yourself and others in how to escape this multiplying viral world of Blimps, battle fierce foes, craft unique items, gather invaluable resources, rescue those in need, explore uncharted territories, smuggle goods, engage in high-octane shootouts, race against time, train your crew, lay siege to rivals, and ultimately survive in your fragile Blimp.

Captains who conquer 77 primary missions and tackle the 12 side missions are rewarded with 11 coveted passport stamps and eight prestigious pilot wings.

Are you ready to take flight?

Game Features:

1. Blimps can be played on computers, Steam Decks, tablets, supporting your fingers, pencils, and connected keyboards, mice, and gamepads. 

2. Blimps features unique handmade sound effects and an instrumental soundtrack to enhance your gaming experience.

3. Pay once for the whole Blimps Unlimited experience. There are no ads or paywalls, Just Blimps, Battles, and Bonding. Master the Skies Today!

4. If you want to try the game without paying up front, check out Blimps Limited, our FREE version.

 

"We hope you enjoy the game. Thanks for playing!"
-Corinne and Ed (Co-game designers of Blimps and Blimps Limited)
